issue.title: Fix #200882 tvguide.com
issue.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/200882

`script.wikia.nocookie.net/fandom-ae-assets/identity-service/` is a tracking link among different sites. I have logged in to `fandom.com` site and looks like the site works normally, but I'm not sure completely.

comment.body:
Looks like there's another site: https://www.reddit.com/r/uBlockOrigin/comments/1kox81x/video_and_picture_viewer_blocked_on_gamespotcom/

I'll remove the rule.

issue.body:

comment.body:
It seems like a bug in the webpage.
This happens when jQuery's load event is fired before the ajax request to `s.kakaku.com/history/ajax/showmenu/` has completed. It can happen without AdGuard.

Strangely enough, the obvious rules:

`gizchina.gr###reactions`
or
`gizchina.gr##.reactions-refresh`

don’t work...

issue.body:
